### Problem 3

#### Data cleaning
```{r}

data(na_noaa)

ny_noaa_df = ny_noaa %>%
          separate(date, into = c("year", "month", "day"), convert = TRUE) %>%
        mutate(
          year = factor(year), 
          month = as.integer(month), 
          day = as.integer(day),
          prcp = as.integer(prcp),
          tmax = as.integer(tmax), 
          tmin = as.integer(tmin), 
          prcp = prcp/10, 
          tmax = tmax/10, 
          tmin = tmin/10
        ) 

```
